import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { faGithub } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons';7 import { faFacebook } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import { faYoutube } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import { faTwitter } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'] }) export class FooterComponent { faGithub = faGithub; faFaceBook = faFacebook; faYoutube = faYoutube; faTwitter = faTwitter; }
